logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: transactionId: #[vars.transactionId], correlationID: #[vars.correlationId], message: "Started update flow", payload:#[payload]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map(covidCase, indexOfCovidCase) -> { caseId: covidCase.case_id, source: covidCase.source, caseType: covidCase.case_type, firstName: covidCase.first_name, lastName: covidCase.last_name, phone: covidCase.phone, email: covidCase.email, dateOfBirth: covidCase.date_of_birth as Date, nationalId: covidCase.national_id, nationalIdType: covidCase.national_id_type, address:{ street_address: covidCase.street_address, city: covidCase.city, state: covidCase.state, postal: covidCase.postal, country: covidCase.country }, createDate: covidCase.create_date, updateDate: covidCase.update_date }

raise-error.doc:name: Raise CUSTOM:CASE_NOT_FOUND error
raise-error.description: The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI

logger.doc:name: End Log
logger.message: transactionId: #[vars.transactionId], correlationID: #[vars.correlationId], message: "Started update flow", payload:#[payload]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "code": 404, "message": "Resource not found", "description": "The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI", "dateTime": now() as DateTime, "transactionId": vars.transactionId }
